availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Johnson (Ballard County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of George Johnson and Cynthia Johnson. Married to Margarett E. Johnson. Father of Anthe Johnson, Martha A. Johnson, Thomas R. Johnson, William F. Johnson, and Josephine Johnson. Resident of Ballard County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Town of Blandville, p. 277. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 1. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Corporation of Blandville, p. 9. Find A Grave, "George Thomas Johnson (1835-1881)," Memorial #35034615, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=35034615&ref=acom (accessed September 19, 2017).
